530:1: tena khalu punaḥ kālena tena samayena rājagṛhe mahānagare ruciraketurnāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prativasati pūrvajinakṛtādhikāro'varopitakuśalamūlo bahubuddhakoṭiniyutaśatasahasraparyupāsitaḥ |
530:3: ko hetu kaḥ pratyayo yadbhagavataḥ śākyamunerevaṃ parīttamāyuḥ pramāṇaṃ yadutāśītivarṣāṇīti |
530:5: uktaṃ caiva bhagavatā dvau hetū dvau ca pratyayau dīrghāyuṣkatāyām |
530:9: tāvadbhagavatā bhojanamādhyātmikaṃ bāhyāni ca vastūni sattvānāṃ parityaktāni |
530:10: antaśaḥ svaśarīramāṃsarudhirāsthimajjayā bubhukṣitāḥ sattvāḥ saṃtarpitāḥ prāgevānyena bhojanena |
530:11: atha tasya puruṣasya buddhānusmṛtimanasikārasyemāmevaṃrūpāṃ cintāṃ cintayamānasya gṛhaṃ vipulaṃ vistīrṇaṃ saṃpravṛttamabhavat |
530:13: tasmiṃśca gṛhe caturdiśi catvāri divyaratnamayānyāsanāni prādurbhutānyabhūvan |
530:14: teṣu cāsaneṣu divyāni paryaṅkāni divyaratnapuṣpapatraiḥ prajñaptāni prādurbhūtāni babhūvaḥ |
530:15: teṣu paryaṅkeṣu divyānyanekaratnapratyuptāni tathāgatavigrahāṇi padmāni prādurbhūtāni |
530:16: teṣu ca padmeṣu catvāro buddhā bhagavantaḥ prādurbhūtāḥ babhuvuḥ |
530:17: purāntikena tvakṣobhyastathāgataḥ prādurbhūto dakṣiṇena ratnaketustathāgataḥ prādurbhūtaḥ paścimenāmitāyustathāgataḥ prādurbhūta uttareṇa dundubhisvarastathāgataḥ prādurbhūtaḥ |
530:19: atha tāvadeva rājagṛhaṃ mahānagaraṃ mahatāvabhāsenāvabhāsitaṃ sphuṭaṃ babhūvu |
530:21: divyāni ca puṣpāṇi prāvarṣurdivyāni ca tūryāṇi pravādayāmāsuḥ |
530:22: sarve cāsmiṃstrisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau sattvā buddhānubhāvena divyasukhena samanvāgatā babhūvuḥ |
530:25: unmattāśca sattvāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilabhante'vikṣiptacittāśca smṛtimanto babhūvuḥ |
530:32: atha khalu ruciraketurbodhiosattvo mahāsattvastānbuddhānbhagavato dṛṣṭvāścaryaprāpto babhūva |
530:33: kathametaditi santuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto yena te buddhā bhagavantastenāñjāliṃ praṇāmyakāratastānbuddhānbhagavato'nusmaramāṇo bhagavataḥ śākyamunerguṇānanusmaramāṇo bhagavataḥ śākyamunerāyuḥpramāṇasaṃśayaprāptastāṃ cintāṃ cintayamānaḥ sthito babhuva |
530:35: kimetad yadbhagavataḥ śākyamunerevaṃ parīttamāyuḥpramāṇaṃ yadutāśīti varṣāṇi |
530:36: atha khalu te buddhā bhagavantaḥ smṛtāḥ saṃprajānāstaṃ ruciraketuṃ bodhisattvametadavocan |
530:37: mā tvaṃ kulaputraivaṃ cintaya evaṃ parīttaṃ bhagavataḥ śākyamunerāyuḥpramāṇam |
530:39: na ca vai kulaputra taṃ samanupaśyāmaḥ sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ sadevamānuṣāsurāyāṃ yaḥ samarthaḥ syādbhagavataḥ śākyamunestathāgatasyāyuḥpramāṇaparyantamadhigantuṃ yāvadaparāntakoṭibhiḥ sthāpayitvā tathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksambuddhaiḥ |
530:41: atha tāvadbuddhānubhāvena kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāśca devaputrāḥ saṃnipatitā yāvannāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragā anekāni ca bodhisattvakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi tasmin ruciraketubodhisattvasya gṛhe samāgatā āsan |
530:42: atha te tathāgatāḥ sarvaparṣado bhagavataḥ śākyamunerāyuḥpramāṇanirdeśaṃ gāthābhirabhyabhāṣan |
530:44: na tu śākyamunerāyuḥ śakyaṃ gaṇayituṃ kvacit || 1 ||
530:45: sumeruṃ paramāṇavaḥ kṛtvā śakyaṃ ca saṃkhyayā |
530:46: na tu śākyamunerāyuḥ śakyaṃ gaṇayituṃ kvacit || 2 ||
530:47: yāḥ kāścit pṛthivīḥ santi yāvantaḥ paramāṇavaḥ |
530:48: śakyaṃ gaṇayituṃ sarvā na tu cāyurjinasya vai || 3 ||
530:50: na tu śākyamunerāyuḥ śakyaṃ gaṇayituṃ kvacit || 4 ||
530:52: eṣa tiṣṭhecca saṃbuddhaḥ saṃkhyāto na hi labhyate || 5 ||
530:53: yasmād dve kāraṇe tasya tathaiva dvau ca pratyayau |
530:54: virataḥ parahiṃsāyā bahu dattaṃ ca bhojanam || 6 ||
530:56: ityuktāni ca kalpāni saṃkhyāyāṃ na tathaiva ca || 7 ||
530:57: tasmānna saṃśayo bho hi mā kiñcit kuru saṃśayam |
530:59: atha khalu tasminsamaye tatra parṣadyācāryavyākaraṇaprāptaḥ kauṇḍinyo nāma brāhmaṇo'nekairbrāhmaṇasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhagavataḥ pūjākarma kṛtvā tathāgatasya mahāparinirvāṇaśabdaṃ śrutvā sahasotthāya bhagavataścaraṇayornipatya bhagavantamevamāha |
530:60: sacetkila bhagavansarvasattvānukampako mahākāruṇiko hitaiṣī sarvasattvānāṃ mātāpitṛbhūto'samasamabhūtaścandrabhūta ālokakaro mahāprajñājñānasūryasamudgataḥ |
530:61: yadi tvaṃ sarvasattvān rāhulaṃ svaṃ saṃpaśyasi mahyamekaṃ varaṃ dehi |
530:63: atha buddhānubhāvena tasyāṃ parṣadi sarvasattvapriyadarśano nāma litsavikumāraḥ |
530:66: kiṃ nu tvaṃ mahābrāhmaṇa bhagavantamekaṃ varaṃ yācase |
530:69: ahamasmillitsavikumāra bhagavataḥ pūjopasthānāya bhagavataḥ sarṣapaphalamātraṃ dhātumicchāmi nikṣepituṃ cūrṇaṃ dhātumabhiprayojanāyainaṃ sarṣapaphalamātraṃ dhātumabhipūjayitvā tridaśādhipatyaṃ labhyata ityevaṃ śrūūyate |
530:70: śṛṇu tvaṃ litsavikumāra suvarṇaprabhāsottamasūtraṃ durvijñeyaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ tādṛśairlakṣaṇaguṇaiḥ samanvāgataṃ kila suvarṇaprabhāsottamasūtraṃ bhāvayiṣyati |
530:71: evaṃ bho litsavikumāra durvijñeyaṃ duranubodhaṃ suvarṇaprabhāsottamasūtram |
530:72: asmākameva pratyantadvīpikānāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ sarṣapaphalamātraṃ dhātuṃ karaṇḍake nikṣipya dhāraṇamucitam |
530:73: ahaṃ te varaṃ yāce yena sattvāḥ kṣiprameva tridaśādhipatyaṃ pratilambhino bhaviṣyanti |
530:74: tvaṃ kila bho litsavikumāra sarṣapaphalamātraṃ dhātuṃ tathāgatasya yācitum |
530:75: dhātuṃ ratnakaraṇḍake nikṣipya dhāraṇāt sarvasattvānāṃ tridaśādhipatyeśvaralābha itīcchase |
530:76: evaṃ mayā ca litsavikumāra iṣṭaṃ varam |
530:77: atha sarvasattvapriyadarśano nāma litsavikumāra ācāryavyākaraṇaprāptaṃ kauṇḍinyabrāhmaṇaṃ gāthābhirabhyabhāṣata |
530:78: yadā strotaḥsu gaṅgāyā roheyuḥ kumudāni ca |
530:86: yadā tīkṣṇā mahāntaśca dantā jāyanti pāṇḍurāḥ |
530:90: tāṃ niśreṇīṃ yadāruhya candraṃ bhakṣati mūṣikaḥ |
530:98: yadā palāśapatrāṇāṃ chatraṃ hi vipulaṃ bhavet |
530:104: etāśca gāthāḥ śrutvācāryavyākaraṇaprāptaḥ kauṇḍinyo brāhmaṇaḥ sarvalokapriyadarśanaṃ litsavikumāraṃ gāthābhiḥ pratyabhāṣata |
530:121: atha khalu dvātriṃśaddevaputrasahasrāṇi tathāgatasya yaṃ gambhīramāyuḥpramāṇanirdeśaṃ śrutvā sarvairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau cittānyutpāditāni te prahṛṣṭamanaḥsaṃkalpā ekasvaranirghoṣeṇa gāthāmabhāṣan |
530:122: na buddhaḥ parinirvāti na dharma parihīyate |
530:126: atha khalu ruciraketurbodhisattvasteṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ tayośca dvayoḥ satpuruṣayorantikādbhagavataḥ śākyamunerāyuḥpramāṇanirdeśaṃ śrutvā tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaścodāreṇa prītiprāmodyena sphuṭo'bhūt |
